tool_description: Auto populate your app & service with accurate and comprehensive PAF & Geocoding data from the Royal Mail
name: UK PostCode API
title: UK PostCode API

api_list.name: /postcodes/{postcode}
api_list.description: Gets addresses for the given UK PostCode

required_parameters.name: postcode
required_parameters.description: Pass a PostCode value for looking up addresses

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-postcode-api.p.rapidapi.com/postcodes/PL11DN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-postcode-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://uk-postcode-api.p.rapidapi.com/postcodes/{postcode}"

api_list.name: /addresses/autocomplete
api_list.description: Suggests address results for a given search term.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: pass a search term for address suggestions for a complete or partial address query

api_list.name: /addresses
api_list.description: Gets addresses for given search term.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Pass a search term to get addresses matching search query

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

api_list.name: /udprn/{udprn}
api_list.description: Gets addresses for given search term.

required_parameters.name: udprn
required_parameters.description: Pass a search term to get addresses matching search query
